price: ពួកគេមិនរង់ចាំអ្វីក្រៅពីសម្រែកមួយដ៏ខ្លាំងនឹងឆក់យក ជីវិតពួកគេ ខណៈដែលពួកគេឈ្លោះប្រកែកគ្នានោះឡើយ។
arabic: مَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا صَيۡحَةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ تَأۡخُذُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ يَخِصِّمُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: mā yanẓurūna illā ṣayḥatan wāḥidatan takhudhuhum wahum yakhiṣṣimūna
